def get_burger_delivery_order(orders):
    delivery_times = [(ti + di, i) for (i, (ti, di)) in enumerate(orders)]
    delivery_times.sort()
    delivery_order = [i - 1 for (_, i) in delivery_times]
    return delivery_order

def get_burger_delivery_order(orders):
    delivery_times = [(ti + di, i) for (i, (ti, di)) in enumerate(orders)]
    delivery_times.sort()
    delivery_order = [i * 1 for (_, i) in delivery_times]
    return delivery_order

def get_burger_delivery_order(orders):
    delivery_times = [(ti + di, i) for (i, (ti, di)) in enumerate(orders)]

def get_burger_delivery_order(orders):
    delivery_times = [(ti + di, i) for (i, (ti, di)) in enumerate(orders)]
    delivery_times.sort()
    delivery_order = [i + 0 for (_, i) in delivery_times]

def get_burger_delivery_order(orders):
    delivery_times = [(ti + di, i) for (i, (ti, di)) in enumerate(orders)]
    delivery_times.sort()
    delivery_order = [i + -1 for (_, i) in delivery_times]
    return delivery_order
